description: An exclusive modern and spacious villa located in a quiet location in Protaras. The plot size is a huge 1600 square meters and the covered area including the garage is an impressive 300 square meters.When you enter the villa you will see the modern open space living room with comfortable sofas, the LCD tv mounted on the wall and a fireplace which is perfect for the cold winter months. On the side is the kitchen with the cooker in the middle, a large fridge, cupboards and sink. There are 4 bedrooms upstairs and one bedroom downstairs, a very well equipped modern kitchen as well as a second smaller kitchen and a large living space with a pool table. The villa is also equipped with a 5Kwh solar panels system.The garden and patio can be accessed from the kitchen and also from the living area. There is also an entrance to the garage from the kitchen. On the ground floor next to the stairs there is the guest W.C. Past the living room there is a bedroom with 2 single beds.Upstairs there is a fridge and laundry space with a clothes dryer and washing machine.On the left side of the corridor there are 2 bedrooms one with ensuite bathrooms and between them there is a large family bathroom with a bath and a toilet. On the right side of the corridor there are another two bedrooms. The first one is designed for children. description: This is a magnificent house suitable for a variety of purposes.It is located in Agioi Omologites close to Junior School, very close to the center of Nicosia.The house features 8 bedrooms overall (4 of them are en-suite) and many areas that can be used for dining, sitting, working or as play rooms.More specifically entering the ground-floor level, the entrance hall leads to the main areas of the house, where the dining room is, the living room and two more sitting lounges and the bar area. From there you can access externally a very nice front balcony and internally the corridor that leads to the main bathroom, the laundry room that can also be used as a kitchenette and 6 more bedrooms, 2 of them are en-suite with spacious bathrooms. Some of the bedrooms feature nice balconies.Externally, all around the house there are nice porch like verandas, BBQ facilities, gardens and garden trees, and also a storage room, and a staircase leading to a basement service room which is again en-suite with it's own shower and wc.The house also features air-conditioning in all areas, central heating, marble floors at ground-floor level, basic electrical equipment, 2 parking areas (one can fit two cars) and it is offered UNFURNISHED.Overall this property is suitable for any family that appreciates big spaces and the excellent residential location close to all amenities, but it is also ideal for other purposes, like an Embassy, an office, a medical center, etc.
